<h3 id="X38038">X(38038) = CENTROID OF TRIANGLE {X(1), X(4), X(11)}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 2*(b+c)*a^6+(b^2-10*b*c+c^2)*a^5-(b+c)*(7*b^2-16*b*c+7*c^2)*a^4-2*(b^2-5*b*c+c^2)*(b-c)^2*a^3+2*(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*(4*b^2-3*b*c+4*c^2)*a^2+(b^2-c^2)^2*(-4*b*c+c^2+b^2)*a-3*(b^2-c^2)^3*(b-c)  :  :

<br>
<b>X(38038) = X(4)+2*X(1387) = 4*X(5)-X(1145) = X(11)+2*X(946) = 2*X(11)+X(1537) = 5*X(11)-2*X(10265) = X(11)-4*X(16174) = X(40)-4*X(6667) = X(80)+5*X(11522) = X(119)-4*X(9955) = 2*X(355)+X(25416) = 4*X(946)-X(1537) = 5*X(946)+X(10265) = X(946)+2*X(16174) = 5*X(1537)+4*X(10265) = X(1537)+8*X(16174) = X(10265)-10*X(16174) = X(12672)+2*X(12736) = 3*X(23513)-X(38128) = 3*X(23513)-2*X(38182) = 3*X(38026)-2*X(38032) = 3*X(38026)-4*X(38044)</b>
<p>X(38038) lies on these lines: {4,1387}, {5,1145}, {11,65}, {30,38026}, {40,6667}, {80,11522}, {100,6918}, {104,5556}, {119,9955}, {149,6835}, {355,25416}, {381,952}, {516,21154}, {517,23513}, {518,38147}, {519,38077}, {528,38021}, {962,31272}, {971,1519}, {1071,18240}, {1125,24466}, {1317,6246}, {1320,3091}, {1482,10598}, {1503,38050}, {1532,22835}, {1699,2829}, {2802,3817}, {3035,8227}, {3036,7982}, {3086,24465}, {3616,10724}, {4301,6702}, {5533,18393}, {5541,20400}, {5587,5854}, {5734,12531}, {5804,12247}, {5840,5886}, {5842,38063}, {5848,38035}, {5851,38036}, {5856,38037}, {5901,22938}, {6265,12690}, {6713,12699}, {6917,10531}, {6971,22791}, {7681,8068}, {7686,12758}, {7687,31523}, {9624,12119}, {9812,32558}, {10058,22753}, {10090,11496}, {10532,10742}, {10595,12735}, {10698,12019}, {10956,17605}, {11570,13374}, {11715,18483}, {11813,38211}, {12611,13257}, {12688,15528}, {12764,26332}, {13273,26333}, {16417,34474}, {18238,33593}, {20330,30311}, {20418,34789}, {21630,37725}, {26726,37714}, {28174,34126}, {28194,38133}, {28198,38069}</p>
<p>
X(38038) = midpoint of X(1699) and X(16173)<br>
X(38038) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (21154, 32557), (34122, 23513), (34123, 5886), (38032, 38044), (38128, 38182), (38156, 38161)<br>
X(38038) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (11, 946, 1537), (946, 16174, 11), (5603, 38034, 38039), (6246, 13464, 1317), (8227, 14217, 3035), (10738, 11729, 10609), (10738, 18493, 11729), (12611, 37726, 13257), (22835, 30384, 1532), (23513, 38128, 38182), (38032, 38044, 38026), (38077, 38156, 38161), (38128, 38182, 34122)<br>
</p>
